title: travelplanner: Can you assist in creating a travel plan that commences in Atlanta, heading to Knoxville for a duration of 3 days, from March 29th to March 31st, 2022. For our accommodations, we are aiming for private rooms that accommodate children under the age of 10. Please note that we'll not be engaging in any self-driving. Overall, we are hoping to stay within a budget of $1,000. (b924a20d23fca330)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.name: restaurant_search

chat_history.content:
# Day 1: March 29th

## Travel
Departure: Atlanta
Destination: Knoxville
Date: March 29th, 2022

Available flight options:
- Flight F3528856: departing at 13:55 and arriving at 14:46, costing $67.
- Flight F3556207: departing at 10:57 and arriving at 11:42, costing $45.
- Flight F3645549: departing at 08:13 and arriving at 09:00, costing $35.

## Accommodation
For your accommodation in Knoxville, I've found a few options that meet your criteria:
- "Brooklyn Sunny Room": a private room for $793, accommodating 2 people, with no visitors and no children under 10 allowed.
- "LES Penthouse": an entire penthouse for $993, accommodating up to 8 people, with no children under 10 allowed and no parties.
- "Cozy Private Room in Chinatown": a private room for $132, accommodating 2 people, suitable for families with children.

Please note that prices and availability may fluctuate, so it's best to check for real-time information.

## Activities
- Visit the Knoxville Museum of Art, located at 1050 Worlds Fair Park Dr.
- Check out the Sunsphere, an iconic observation tower offering panoramic views of the city.
- Take a Knoxville Walking Tour to explore the city's history and culture.

## Dining
For dinner, consider:
- Cafe Arabelle: offering a variety of cuisines including French, BBQ, and seafood, with an average cost of $29.
- Les 3 Brasseurs: a restaurant serving pizza, Italian, and Indian dishes, with an average cost of $24 and high ratings.

# Day 2: March 30th

## Activities
- Visit Zoo Knoxville, home to a variety of animal species.
- Explore the Knoxville Botanical Garden and Arboretum, a beautiful garden with a range of plants and floral species.
- Enjoy a Haunted Knoxville Ghost Tour for a unique experience.

## Dining
- Burger Planet: a casual dining spot with American and cafe fare, costing around $45 on average.
- Rama Vaishnav Bhojnalaya: serving tea, cafe dishes, pizza, and desserts for an average of $46.

# Day 3: March 31st

## Activities
- Visit the World's Fair Park, a large urban park with beautiful gardens and a history museum.
- Explore the McClung Museum of Natural History & Culture, featuring exhibits on natural history and anthropology.
- Take a stroll through Chilhowee Park & Exposition Center, a scenic park with a variety of attractions.

## Dining
- Sky On 57: a restaurant offering a range of options including tea, cafe items, pizza, and seafood with an average cost of $150.
- Mamagoto: serving Indian, Mediterranean, and seafood dishes for around $14 on average.

Please note that the total cost of this trip, including flights and accommodation, may exceed your budget of $1000. It's recommended to check the latest prices and availability to ensure a smooth and budget-friendly trip.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
